data.title: Lorraine Toussaint Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Lorraine Toussaint on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Lorraine Toussaint including If These Walls Could Talk, The Night Befâ¦
data.text:
Fatal Retraction

A case of mistaken identity results in the release of a convicted psycho-killer. Now Brenda and the Priority Homicide Division not only have to find the killer, but also the real identity of victim.

Standards & Practices

While the Priority Homicide Division is busy investigating the murder of a Hollywood producer, an anonymous complaint is filed against Brenda that threatens to jeopardize her career.

The Other Woman

Olivia and her team must do some heavy lifting -- literally -- to clean up the mess after a public figure is caught in a compromising position; Cyrus and Fitz must deal with a foreign-policy emergency.
